validateNotNull

public static void validateNotNull(org.apache.wicket.Component owner,
                                   org.apache.wicket.markup.html.form.FormComponent<?> formComponent)
Validates that a form component is not null. An error resource key that consists of error.formComponentId must be defined relevant to the owner component.

Parameters:
owner - Owner component that does the validation and the resource key is defined relevant to it.
formComponent - For component being validated.

Parameters:
owner - Owner component that does the validation and the resource key is defined relevant to it.
resourceKey - Resource key for the resource message. The resource key must be relevant to the owner component.
formComponents - Form components being validated.

disableComponent

public static <T> void disableComponent(org.apache.wicket.markup.html.form.FormComponent<T> component)
Some FormComponent types need special treatment when disabling. The logic for these cases can be added here.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of model object.
Parameters:
component - FormComponent to disable.

mountBookmarkablePagesFromFile

public static void mountBookmarkablePagesFromFile(String fPath,
                                                  org.apache.wicket.protocol.http.WebApplication webApplication)
Mounts a number of bookmarkable wicket pages, from a resource properties file.
If a Page class is not found, an ERROR is logged to facilitate continuous integration test execution.

Parameters:
fPath - Resource path of properties file.
webApplication - WebApplication instance.
